text: Athyunnathangalil Koodaaram Panithavar is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by PM Abdul Azeez and starring Thilakan and Raghavan in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Thilakan * Raghavan * Raji P Menon ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Athyunnathangalil Koodaaram Panithavar
